item.title: Rainbird Irrigation into Home Assistant & Full tutorial on Winterization
item.description: Here I add WiFi LNK module to my ESP-TM2 Rainbird Irrigation System and add the integration to Home Assistant. Once completed, I winterize the irrigation system for the coming winter.
